channel.title: Playing on another computer in same network?
channel.description:
I have two computer in my home network (hooked up to the same router) and I have MoparScape on both of them. I was wondering if (1) You have to have the 43594 port forwarded to play on the non-hosting computer and (2) What Server IP does the non-hosting computer use? 0.0.0.0:43594? Localhost? SERVERNAME.no-ip.org?
TestScape Thanks, -Ryu

item.title: Playing on another computer in same network?
